Events.OnAcceptedUndock:
(block ( (kateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) )
; Order the ship to go to the orbit of the manipulators (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'orbit (sysFindObject Nil "tN +star;") 63)
; Exploring (msnSetData gSource 'status 'goingToExplore) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgFollow)) )
Events.OnUpdate:
(block ( (status (msnGetData gSource 'status)) (kateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) ) (switch (= status 'outOfFuel) ; If we have fuel, then go resume previous status (if (objGetItems kateObj "f") (block ( (prevStatus (msnGetData gSource 'prevStatus)) ) (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (switch (= prevStatus 'exploring) (shpOrder kateObj 'orbit (sysFindObject Nil "tN +star;") 63)
(= prevStatus 'dockAtControlPoint) (shpOrder kateObj 'dock (sysFindObject gSource "TN +hereticControlPoint;")) ) (msnSetData gSource 'status prevStatus) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgRefueled)) ) )
(not (objGetItems kateObj "f")) (block Nil ; Remember our current status (msnSetData gSource 'prevStatus status) (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'hold) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'outOfFuel) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgOutOfFuel)) )
(= status 'goingToExplore) (if (leq (sysVectorDistance (objGetPos kateObj)) 65) (block Nil (objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgInPosition)) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'exploring) (msnSetData gSource 'timer 120) ) )
(= status 'exploring) (switch (leq (msnIncData gSource 'timer -1) 0) (block Nil (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'hold) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'doneExploring)
(objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgSuccess)) ) (= (modulo (msnGetData gSource 'timer) 9) 0) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgScanning)) )
(= status 'dockAtControlPoint) (if (objIsDockedAt kateObj (sysFindObject gSource "TN +hereticControlPoint")) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'status 'campEstablished) (msnSuccess gSource) ) )
) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch ; Need to check if we're in the right system as our owner will ascend (!= (msnGetProperty gSource 'nodeID) (sysGetNode)) Nil
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) )
Events.OnCompleted:
(switch (= aReason 'success) (block ( (controlPoint (sysFindObject gSource "TN +hereticControlPoint")) theMission ) ; Kate is now in the control point (typSetData &unidKateMorgental; 'lastShipClass Nil) (objSetData controlPoint 'stationMaster 'kateMorgental)
; Start the Iocrym attacks (if (setq theMission (msnFind "Po +unid:&msHereticIocrymAttack;;")) (msnSetUnavailable theMission) ) ) )
Events.OnGlobalSystemStarted:
(switch ; If not in Heretic, then nothing to do (!= (sysGetNode) 'G2) Nil
; Nothing if we've already completed (msnFind "r +unid:&msHereticSvalbard;;") Nil
; If mission is already active then we need to restore previous orders (rpgIsMissionActive &msHereticSvalbard;) (block (kateMorgentalObj) (setq kateMorgentalObj (rpgCharacterCreateShip &unidKateMorgental;)) (enum (typGetData &unidKateMorgental; 'lastOrders) order (block (cmd) (setq cmd (append kateMorgentalObj (@ order 'desc))) (if (@ order 'objID) (set@ cmd 2 (objGetObjByID (@ order 'objID)))) (apply shpOrder cmd) ) ) )
; Set up (block (kateMorgentalObj) ; Create Kate
(setq kateMorgentalObj (rpgCharacterCreateShip &unidKateMorgental; &scSvalbardExplorer; (objGetPos (sysGetObjectByName 'svalbardMarker)) ) )
(shpOrder kateMorgentalObj 'wait) ) )

Language.Text:
Escort the Svalbard Explorer as she scans the Iocrym structures orbiting the Heretic sun.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

The bridge of the Svalbard hums with activity. An elegant woman is giving orders as you walk in. She turns to you:
"Welcome to the Svalbard! My name is Kate Morgental and I'm in charge of this research expedition. My father is gathering intelligence about the Iocrym and trying to understand why they have blocked our access to the rest of the galaxy. He's asked me to study them here in the Heretic system."

The bridge of the Svalbard hums with activity and you see a familiar face giving orders as you walk in. Kate Morgental is excited to see you:
"Hello, %name%! It's great to see you again. Welcome to the Svalbard! I knew that our paths would cross again. My father is gathering intelligence about the Iocrym and trying to understand why they have blocked our access to the rest of the galaxy. He's asked me to study them here in the Heretic system."

The bridge of the Svalbard hums with activity. You see Kate Morgental at the center of the bridge giving orders. A ripple of contempt flashes across her face as she sees you:
"%name%. I haven't forgotten what you did! But our work is too important to let emotions get in the way. My father wants to learn more about the Iocrym and he's asked me to study their technology here in the Heretic system."

"The truth is that we need help. We want to scan the Iocrym structures that are surrounding the Heretic sun, but the area is infested with pteravores and we don't dare get too close without protection."

"I was hoping you'd say that! We're going to orbit around the Heretic sun to study the Iocrym devices. Follow us and protect us from pteravores. If they attach to our ship they will drain our reactor and we'll be helpless.
"Good luck!"

"Well, we don't have a choice; we'll have to trust you."
"Escort us while we do our scan and maybe your good deed will salve your conscience."
Language.String: "We're still scanning the Iocrym devices. No definitive results yet."
Language.Text:
The bridge is dim and almost silent. Kate Morgental approaches you:
"Pteravores have eaten all our fuel! We can't continue our research unless we get some pteracnium or even xenotite. Can you help us?"
"We can last for a while on emergency power, but if you can find some fuel and bring it here we will be able to continue our research."

Kate looks exhausted, but pleased:
"Great work! We've finished our scan. The Iocrym devices are manipulating the graviton flux of the Heretic star. They have created an event horizon that prevents us from leaving the inner system."
"All of the Iocrym devices are controlled from a central point. If we set up a research base there we may be able to disable them! Follows us there and we'll see!"
"Follow us to the Iocrym control point and maybe we can figure out a way to disable the Iocrym quarantine."
Language.String: The Iocrym are altering the Heretic sun!
